name: Kanken 5級 Reading Quiz
instructions: Type the reading of the below word in Hiragana!

cards.question: 発揮
cards.meaning: show (of power, ability, etc.), exhibition, demonstration, display, manifestation

cards.question: 縦断
cards.meaning: running through (north-south), cutting across, travelling across

cards.question: 著者
cards.meaning: author (usu. of a particular book), writer

cards.question: 郵便
cards.meaning: mail service, postal service, mail, post

cards.question: 専門
cards.meaning: speciality, specialty, subject of study, expert, area of expertise

cards.question: 一層
cards.meaning: much more, still more, all the more, more than ever

cards.question: 故障
cards.meaning: breakdown, failure, fault, accident, out of order

cards.question: 誤飲
cards.meaning: accidental ingestion, swallowing something by mistake

cards.question: 郷土
cards.meaning: native place, birth-place, one's old home

cards.question: 厳格
cards.meaning: strict, severe, stern, rigid, rigorous, tough

cards.question: 拡散
cards.meaning: scattering, diffusion, spread (e.g. signal across the spectrum)

cards.question: 株
cards.meaning: stock, share, stake, post, pile, picket, stump

cards.question: 巻
cards.meaning: roll (e.g. of cloth), volume (of book), reel (of film)

cards.question: 故郷
cards.meaning: home town, birthplace, native place, one's old home

cards.question: 敬語
cards.meaning: honorific, term of respect, polite expression, honorific language

cards.question: 正座
cards.meaning: seiza, kneeling with the tops of the feet flat on the floor, and sitting on the soles, seat of honor, seat of honour

cards.question: 対策
cards.meaning: measure, provision, step, countermeasure, counterplan, countermove

cards.question: 姿勢
cards.meaning: posture, pose, position, stance, carriage (of the body)

cards.question: 歌詞
cards.meaning: song lyrics, words of a song, libretto, words mainly used in songs or poetry

cards.question: 処理
cards.meaning: processing, dealing with, treatment, disposition, disposal

cards.question: 盛り
cards.meaning: peak, prime days, serving (of food), helping

cards.question: 正視
cards.meaning: looking straight ahead, looking in the face

cards.question: 善処
cards.meaning: handling carefully, tiding over, making best of, using discretion

cards.question: 訳
cards.meaning: conclusion from reasoning, judgement or calculation based on something read or heard, reason, cause, meaning, circumstances, situation, translation, version (e.g. "English version")

cards.question: 宗教
cards.meaning: religion, religious affiliation, belief, faith, creed

cards.question: 公私
cards.meaning: public and private, official and personal, government and people

cards.question: 寸前
cards.meaning: on the verge, on the brink, just in front of, just before

cards.question: 我
cards.meaning: I, me, my, our, one's own, obstinacy

cards.question: 班長
cards.meaning: squad leader, group leader, team leader

cards.question: 紅白
cards.meaning: red and white, colours for festive or auspicious occasions (colors)

cards.question: 若い
cards.meaning: youth, like, similar to, same as

cards.question: 卵
cards.meaning: eggs, egg, spawn, roe, eggshell, ovum, ovule, egg cell

cards.question: 役割
cards.meaning: part, assigning (allotment of) parts, role, duties

cards.question: 観衆
cards.meaning: spectators, onlookers, members of the audience

cards.question: 鉄棒
cards.meaning: iron rod, iron bar, iron club, metal rod, metal bar, crowbar

cards.question: 裏
cards.meaning: bottom (or another side that is hidden from view), undersurface, opposite side, reverse side

cards.question: 骨
cards.meaning: bone, knack, skill, trick, secret, know-how, the ropes, hang

cards.question: 異世界
cards.meaning: fantasy world, the place we all want to go

cards.question: 冊子
cards.meaning: book, booklet, story book, pamphlet, notebook, written work (esp. a bound text, as opposed to a scroll)

cards.question: 諸国
cards.meaning: various countries, various regions, various provinces

cards.question: 担当
cards.meaning: being in charge (of an area of responsibility), being responsible (for a work role, etc.)

cards.question: 陛下
cards.meaning: Your Majesty, His Majesty, Her Majesty

cards.question: 取捨
cards.meaning: adoption or rejection, selection, choice, option

cards.question: 提供
cards.meaning: offer, tender, program sponsoring, programme sponsoring, furnishing, provisioning, supply

cards.question: 主従
cards.meaning: master and servant, lord and retainer, employer and employee

cards.question: 地層
cards.meaning: stratum, geological formation, layer, bed (coal, gravel, etc.)

cards.question: 検討
cards.meaning: consideration, examination, investigation, study, scrutiny, discussion, analysis, review

cards.question: 度胸
cards.meaning: courage, bravery, pluck, nerve, grit, guts

cards.question: 鉄骨
cards.meaning: steel frame, steel beam, steel girder

cards.question: 解除
cards.meaning: cancellation, rescinding, release, calling off, lifting (sanctions), delisting

cards.question: 源
cards.meaning: source (of a river), fountainhead, source, origin

cards.question: 傷口
cards.meaning: (opening of) a wound, (mouth of a) wound, cut

cards.question: 地蔵
cards.meaning: Kshitigarbha (bodhisattva who looks over children, travellers and the underworld) (travelers), Ksitigarbha, Jizo

cards.question: 済み
cards.meaning: arranged, taken care of, settled, completed, finished

cards.question: 縦横
cards.meaning: length and width, length and breadth, lengthwise and crosswise, longitude and latitude, vertical and horizontal

cards.question: 背景
cards.meaning: background, scenery, backdrop, setting, circumstance, context

cards.question: 誤る
cards.meaning: make a mistake, make an error

cards.question: 参拝
cards.meaning: visit to a shrine or temple, paying homage at a shrine or temple

cards.question: 忠実
cards.meaning: faithfulness, devotion, loyalty, honesty, truth, fidelity, sincerity, conscientiousness, diligence

cards.question: 救済
cards.meaning: relief, aid, rescue, salvation, help, salvation (from suffering based on Buddha's teachings)

cards.question: 専念
cards.meaning: absorption, giving undivided attention, devoting oneself (to)

cards.question: 俳句
cards.meaning: haiku, 17-mora poem, usu. in 3 lines of 5, 7 and 5 morae

cards.question: 並列
cards.meaning: arranging in a line, standing in a row

cards.question: 意欲
cards.meaning: will, desire, ambition, urge (e.g. creative urge)

cards.question: 翌週
cards.meaning: the following week, the next week

cards.question: 区域
cards.meaning: limits, boundary, domain, zone, sphere, territory

cards.question: 映像
cards.meaning: reflection, image, picture (e.g. on a television), shot

cards.question: 傷
cards.meaning: wound, injury, cut, gash, bruise, scratch, scrape, scar

cards.question: 乗降
cards.meaning: getting on and off, embarking and disembarking

cards.question: 注視
cards.meaning: gazing steadily at, observing (a person) closely, maintain a watch over

cards.question: 存分
cards.meaning: to one's heart's content, as much as one wants

cards.question: 正誤
cards.meaning: right or wrong, correct and incorrect

cards.question: 若気
cards.meaning: youthful impetuosity, youthful vitality, male homosexual's partner

cards.question: 分担
cards.meaning: taking on one's share (e.g. of work), dividing (work, expenses, etc.) between, apportionment, allotment, allocation, assignment
